text.author: Wikinews
text.title: Wikinews interviews Robert Sarvis, Libertarian Party nominee for Governor of Virginia
text.summary: In an interview with Wikinews, Attorney Robert Sarvis , the Libertarian Party's nominee for Governor of Virginia in 2013, answers questions about his candidacy, including regarding his background as a mixed-race half-Chinese Virginian, his criticism of Governor Bob McDonnell, problems with the two party system, and how he would handle a hostile legislature.
